casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Samson Jamarco COLEMAN 404P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 25, 2017 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Samson Jamarco Coleman, for Coleman, Samson Jamarco.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of September 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of September 2017."
